.. _`SnpSift dnNSFP`:

SNPSIFT DNNSFP
==============

Annotate using integrated annotation from dbNSFP.





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_snpsift_dbnsfp:
        input:
            vcf = "in.vcf",
            dbNSFP = "dbNSFP.txt.gz"
        output:
            vcf = "annotated/out.vcf"
        log:
            "annotate.log"
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-212-g458009d7/bio/snpsift/dbnsfp"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris
